attributes.action: Have a referendum on the illegal immigrant bill.
attributes.additional_details: Because the illegal immigrantion policies in this country are not working and not slowing down the illegal immigrants coming over here
attributes.background: Change the illegal immigration bill so we have a system similar to Australia where bouts are not allowed to enter our water

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to hold a referendum on revoking the Illegal Migration Act 2023, or introduce new legislation to tackle illegal migration in a different way.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create international waters in Dover Strait, and turn back migrant boats: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641012

Investigate the legality of pushing back boats seeking to enter the UK illegally: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639252
